entries.name: logger
entries.desc: The server logger.  This is independent from the HTTP access log.

entries.name: status
entries.desc: The server status.  One of :Stop, :Running or :Shutdown

entries.name: tokens
entries.desc: Tokens control the number of outstanding clients.  The :MaxClients configuration sets this.

entries.name: new(config={}, default=Config::General)
entries.desc: Creates a new generic server from config.  The default configuration comes from default.

entries.name: listen(address, port)
entries.desc: Adds listeners from address and port to the server.  See WEBrick::Utils.create_listeners for details.

entries.name: run(sock)
entries.desc: You must subclass GenericServer and implement #run which accepts a TCP client socket

entries.name: shutdown()
entries.desc: Shuts down the server and all listening sockets.  New listeners must be provided to restart the server.

entries.name: start(&block)
entries.desc: Starts the server and runs the block for each connection.  This method does not return until the server is stopped from a signal handler or another thread using stop or shutdown.

entries.name: stop()
entries.desc: Stops the server from accepting new connections.
